item.title: How to add WiFi capabilities to your Arduino Nano BLE Sense board
item.description: Introduction The Arduino Nano BLE Sense development board is a powerful piece of kit with multiple sensors (accelerometer, microphone, humidity, …) included - perfect for anyone wanting to start out in IoT development. Fitted with a nRF52840 [1] microcontroller, the development board boasts an ARM Cortex-M4 processor, enabling the deployment of machine learning models via TensorFlow Lite. Unfortunately, one of the downsides to this board is the lack of WiFi capabilities.
